text: Methotrexate is a drug. It is used to treat cancer and other autoimmune diseases. It can also be used to cause a medical abortion in the early stages of pregnancy. Category:Drugs Category:Cancer treatment Category:Organonitrogen compounds Category:Carboxylic acids Category:Abortion Category:Pharmacology Category:Obstetrics and gynecology Category:Medical abortion Category:Contraception
title: Methotrexate
